title: Chris Elmore – 2022 Comments on Boris Johnson and Rishi Sunak Being Fined for Breaking Rules
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Chris Elmore, the Labour MP for Ogmore, on Twitter on 12 April 2022.
content:
They’ve broken the laws they set, they lied to country and parliament, there is criminality at the heart of government.
